description: Architectural elevation sheet showing all four building elevations (West, South, North, East), a roof plan with solar panel array layout, two building cross-sections (A and B), a capillary break detail, roofing material specifications, and net free area ventilation calculations.
key_content: West Elevation at 1/4" = 1'-0" scale, 30'-4" ADU width
South Elevation with entry door, patio cover, and address number location (4" painted black)
North Elevation showing gable vent, electric meter, water heater enclosure
East Elevation showing 100A cable drop, subpanel, gable vent
Roof Plan with solar panel array on south-facing slope (8 panels, 2 rows of 4)
Class A fire-rated composition shingle roofing, max 6 lbs/sq ft
30# ASTM felt building paper, 15/32" CDX plywood sheathing
Net free area ventilation calculation: gable vents 12"x24"
Capillary break detail (N.T.S.) with 3-coat stucco system
Wall assembly: stucco exterior, R-15 insulation, 5/8" Type X gypsum board interior
Section A and Section B at 1/4" = 1'-0" showing R-15 wall and ceiling insulation
Address numbers: minimum 4" with 0.5" stroke, contrasting color
NOT SHOWN: explicit building height dimension (grade to peak)
NOT SHOWN: solar panel kW rating (shown on plan but no specs)
